long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Integrate your Mailchimp email templates directly into Gmailâ„¢ for seamless access and increased productivity!

This extension allows you to:
âœ…  Import Mailchimp email templates to Gmailâ„¢
âœ…  Send your MailChimp template via Gmailâ„¢ without leaving the Mailchimp editor
âœ…  No more sending emails from impersonal "no-reply@url.com" email addresses; they are sent from your email address
âœ…  After importing your Mailchimp email templates into Gmail, you can access them in your new Gmail email template library without ever leaving Gmail. 

Whether you're a sales professional, small business owner, designer, marketer or anyone needing access to their Mailchimp templates, this app simplifies the process and keeps you productive. This is your solution to conveniently send high quality, personalized emails.

~~~ Key Features ~~~
ğŸŒŸ Import your Mailchimp templates directly into Gmailâ„¢.
ğŸŒŸ Send your Mailchimp templates using your email, without ever leaving Mailchimp.
ğŸŒŸ Unlimited template storage for Premium Plan users.
ğŸŒŸ Quick and easy installation, works in Chrome and Microsoft Edge without consuming space on your computer.
ğŸŒŸ 5-Star ratings by our highly satisfied users.

How it works:

1. Install the extension.
2. Go to https://admin.mailchimp.com/templates/
3. Choose the template you want to send. 
4. You will see a "Gmail" icon next to your template. Click on it and your template will show in your Gmail email compose window. 
5. Send your email using your own Gmail address, without leaving Mailchimp.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mailchimp Templates in Gmail by cloudHQ is perfect for:

ğŸ¯ **Sales Professionals** who need access to their email templates from Gmail to effectively reach out to clients.

ğŸ¯ **Small Business Owners** who appreciate the convenience of sending customized emails right from their Gmail.

ğŸ¯ **Designers and Marketers** who love to send visually stunning emails from their Gmail without leaving Mailchimp.

ğŸ¯ **Anyone** who wants a more efficient way to access their Mailchimp templates.

No more switching between platforms or impersonal emails. Start improving your productivity with Mailchimp Templates in Gmail by cloudHQ.

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

long.it:
Integra i tuoi template di email Mailchimp direttamente in Gmail per un accesso senza soluzione di continuitÃ  e un aumento della produttivitÃ !

Questa estensione ti consente di:
âœ…  Importare i template di email Mailchimp in Gmail
âœ…  Inviare il tuo template MailChimp tramite Gmail senza uscire dall'editor di Mailchimp
âœ…  Non invierai piÃ¹ email dagli impersonali indirizzi email "no-reply@url.com"; saranno inviate dal tuo indirizzo email
âœ…  Dopo aver importato i tuoi template di email Mailchimp in Gmail, puoi accedervi nella tua nuova libreria di template di email Gmail senza mai lasciare Gmail.

Che tu sia un professionista delle vendite, un proprietario di piccola impresa, un designer, un marketer o chiunque abbia bisogno di accedere ai propri template Mailchimp, questa app semplifica il processo e ti mantiene produttivo. Questa Ã¨ la tua soluzione per inviare comodamente email di alta qualitÃ  e personalizzate.

~~~ Caratteristiche chiave ~~~
ğŸŒŸ Importa i tuoi template Mailchimp direttamente in Gmail.
ğŸŒŸ Invia i tuoi template Mailchimp utilizzando il tuo indirizzo Gmail, senza mai uscire da Mailchimp.
ğŸŒŸ Archiviazione di template illimitata per gli utenti del piano premium.
ğŸŒŸ Installazione rapida e semplice, funziona in Chrome e Microsoft Edge senza consumare spazio sul tuo computer.
ğŸŒŸ Valutazioni a 5 stelle dai nostri utenti altamente soddisfatti.

Come funziona:

1. Installa l'estensione.
2. Vai su https://admin.mailchimp.com/templates/
3. Scegli il template che vuoi inviare.
4. Vedrai un'icona "Gmail" accanto al tuo template. Cliccaci sopra e il tuo template apparirÃ  nella tua finestra di composizione email di Gmail.
5. Invia la tua email utilizzando il tuo indirizzo Gmail, senza uscire da Mailchimp.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I template Mailchimp in Gmail di cloudHQ sono perfetti per:

ğŸ¯ **Professionisti delle vendite** che hanno bisogno di accedere ai loro template di email da Gmail per raggiungere efficacemente i clienti.

ğŸ¯ **Proprietari di piccole imprese** che apprezzano la comoditÃ  di inviare email personalizzate direttamente dal loro Gmail.

ğŸ¯ **Designer e marketer** che amano inviare email visivamente sorprendenti dal loro Gmail senza uscire da Mailchimp.

ğŸ¯ **Chiunque** voglia un modo piÃ¹ efficiente per accedere ai propri template Mailchimp.

long.nl:
Integreer uw Mailchimp e-mailtemplates rechtstreeks in Gmail voor naadloze toegang en verhoogde productiviteit!

Deze extensie stelt u in staat om:
âœ… Mailchimp e-mailtemplates te importeren naar Gmail
âœ… Uw MailChimp-sjabloon te verzenden via Gmail zonder de Mailchimp-editor te verlaten
âœ… Niet meer e-mails versturen vanuit onpersoonlijke "no-reply@url.com" e-mailadressen; ze worden verzonden vanaf uw e-mailadres
âœ… Nadat u uw Mailchimp e-mailtemplates in Gmail hebt geÃ¯mporteerd, kunt u ze raadplegen in uw nieuwe Gmail e-mailtemplate bibliotheek zonder ooit Gmail te verlaten. 

Of u nu een verkoopprofessional, kleine ondernemer, ontwerper, marketeer of wie dan ook bent die toegang nodig heeft tot hun Mailchimp-sjablonen, deze app vereenvoudigt het proces en houdt u productief. Dit is uw oplossing om gemakkelijk hoogwaardige, gepersonaliseerde e-mails te versturen.

~~~ Belangrijkste kenmerken ~~~
ğŸŒŸ Importeer uw Mailchimp-sjablonen rechtstreeks in Gmail.
ğŸŒŸ Verzend uw Mailchimp-sjablonen met uw Gmail-adres, zonder ooit Mailchimp te verlaten.
ğŸŒŸ Onbeperkte opslag van sjablonen voor gebruikers van het Premium Plan.
ğŸŒŸ Snelle en eenvoudige installatie, werkt in Chrome en Microsoft Edge zonder ruimte op uw computer in te nemen.
ğŸŒŸ 5-sterrenbeoordelingen van onze zeer tevreden gebruikers.

Hoe het werkt:

1. Installeer de extensie.
2. Ga naar https://admin.mailchimp.com/templates/
3. Kies het sjabloon dat u wilt verzenden.
4. U ziet een "Gmail" pictogram naast uw sjabloon. Klik erop en uw sjabloon wordt weergegeven in uw Gmail e-mail opmaakvenster.
5. Verzend uw e-mail via uw eigen Gmail-adres, zonder Mailchimp te verlaten.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mailchimp-sjablonen in Gmail van cloudHQ is perfect voor:

ğŸ¯ **Verkoopprofessionals** die toegang nodig hebben tot hun e-mailtemplates vanuit Gmail om effectief contact op te nemen met klanten.

ğŸ¯ **Kleine bedrijfseigenaren** die het gemak waarderen van het verzenden van gepersonaliseerde e-mails rechtstreeks vanuit hun Gmail.

ğŸ¯ **Ontwerpers en marketeers** die graag visueel verbluffende e-mails verzenden vanuit hun Gmail zonder Mailchimp te verlaten.

ğŸ¯ **Iedereen** die een efficiÃ«ntere manier wil om toegang te krijgen tot hun Mailchimp-sjablonen.

Niet meer schakelen tussen platforms of onpersoonlijke e-mails. Begin met het verbeteren van uw productiviteit met Mailchimp-sjablonen in Gmail van cloudHQ.

cloudHQ. Uw productiviteit helpt, 1 klik per keer.

Prijzen: https://www.mailchimp-templates-in-gmail.com/pricing
Ondersteuningspagina: https://support.cloudhq.net/?s=mailchimp
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net.
